qas.question: Why was the 360 considered a market success for Microsoft?

answers.text: it strengthened Microsoft as a major force in the console market

qas.question: What problem hurt Nintendo's Wii console?

answers.text: collapse of third-party software support in its later years

qas.question: The Playstation 3 originally struggled for market share for what reasons?

answers.text: due to being too expensive and initially lacking quality titles

qas.question: What is the successor to the 360 called?
Which console sold the most units in the seventh generation era?
What was the best selling console of the sixth gen?
What feature of the Xbox 360 collapsed?

plausible_answers.text: too expensive and initially lacking quality titles

qas.question: What features caused Wii U to struggle?
